title: Exact Match For Arial-Like Font
content:
Anyone have an exact ID on this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090909024417im_/http:/typophile.com/files/arial-like_5440.jpg)
author: Fontophile

comments.content: thx for reply, but frutiger doesn’t match exactly for me.
do you have a better scan?

That’s all I have... I tried a different version of Frutiger and that worked better, though subtle details like the flatness of the tail on the “e” still didn’t match. I suppose scanning noise could be causing the difference....

It could even be something that looks like Frutiger (and strictly speaking, _is_ “Frutiger”) but goes under a different name, like Bitstream’s [Humanist 777](http://web.archive.org/web/20090909024417/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/humanist+777/fonts/).
